hero.title: Unlock the Full Power of Influencer Marketing with INFLYTE
hero.subTitle: Discover the right influencers for your brand and make a secure and transparent collaboration agreement using blockchain technology
hero.shortBio:
INFLYTE is a cutting-edge influencer marketing platform that connects advertisers with the most relevant influencers for their campaigns. With the use of smart contracts and artificial intelligence/machine learning (AI/ML), INFLYTE ensures secure transactions, advanced analytics, and influencer matching.
 Join INFLYTE now to gain an advantage in the upcoming era of decentralized influence marketing.

features.title: Smart Contract Functionality
features.description: Our platform utilizes smart contracts to ensure secure, efficient, and transparent transactions.

features.title: AI/ML-Driven Influencer Matching
features.description: Our advanced analytics system uses AI and machine learning to match businesses with the perfect influencer for their needs.

features.title: Multi-Platform Coverage
features.description: Our platform supports a wide variety of social media networks, including Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, YouTube, and Facebook.
features.icon:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" strokeWidth={1.5} stroke="currentColor" className="w-6 h-6">

features.title: Community-Driven Governance
features.description: Our platform utilizes a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) system, allowing for community-driven decision making and dispute resolution through a jury of high-rated accounts holding governance tokens.

features.title: Transparent Brand and Influencer Profiles
features.description: Our open profile feature allows for transparent information on both brands and influencers.

features.title: Cryptocurrency and Fiat Deposit/Withdrawal
features.description: Our platform supports both cryptocurrency and fiat currency deposits and withdrawals.

features.title: Advanced Widgets for Businesses
features.description: Our widget system provides businesses with detailed analytics and helps them find the ideal influencer for their needs.

features.title: Reputation-based Influencer Rating
features.description: Our rating system allows businesses to quickly identify the most reputable and suitable influencer for their needs.

features.title: Low Fees
features.description: We offer lower fees than traditional influence marketing agencies and competitors.

stats.title: Find the perfect match for your brand with ease
stats.subTitle: INFLYTE is a cutting-edge influencer marketing platform that connects advertisers with the most relevant influencers for their campaigns. With the use of smart contracts and artificial intelligence/machine learning (AI/ML), INFLYTE ensures secure transactions, advanced analytics, and influencer matching.

leftSide.subTitle: Secure your campaign with our guarantee. Your budget is protected by a smart contract, ensuring that the task description is clearly outlined

rightSide.subTitle: Low fee for successful campaigns, your brand reputation is worth the investment.

faq.question: What is Smart Contract ?
faq.answer: A smart contract is a computer program that can automatically execute the terms of a contract when certain conditions are met. On the Ethereum network, people can use smart contracts to make agreements and exchange things like money and property without the need for a middleman. Think of it like a digital version of a written contract that can be enforced automatically by a computer.

faq.question: How much fees will be charged for the transaction?
faq.answer: The fees will be 5% of the total budget of the campaign.

faq.question: How can I be sure that the Influencer will complete the campaign?
faq.answer: The Influencer will be required to sign a smart contract that outlines the terms and conditions of the campaign. If the Influencer fails to complete the campaign, the advertiser can cancel the campaign and the budget will be returned to the advertiser.

faq.question: How can I be sure that the Influencer is real?
faq.answer: All influencers on our platform are verified by our team. We also use AI/ML algorithms to detect fake accounts and remove them from our platform.

faq.question: What if I do not like the result of the advertising campaign?
faq.answer: If you are not satisfied with the result of the campaign, you can cancel the campaign and your budget will be refunded or send the DAO community for consideration if the situation is controversial

With the use of smart contracts and artificial intelligence/machine learning (AI/ML), INFLYTE ensures secure transactions, advanced analytics, and influencer matching.

stats.title: Find your next campaign
stats.subTitle: Inflyte have lot of campaigns for you to choose from.

leftSide.subTitle: We only work with brands that are willing to pay for your work.

rightSide.subTitle: We don't charge any fees for our services.

faq.question: What is Smart Contract ?
faq.answer: A smart contract is a computer program that can automatically execute the terms of a contract when certain conditions are met. On the Ethereum network, people can use smart contracts to make agreements and exchange things like money and property without the need for a middleman. Think of it like a digital version of a written contract that can be enforced automatically by a computer.

faq.question: How I can get paid ?
faq.answer: You will receive your payment in the form of cryptocurrency. We will send you the payment once the campaign is complete.

faq.question: How much fees will be charged for the transaction?
faq.answer: The fees will be charged by the cryptocurrency network. We don't charge any fees for our services.

faq.question: How I can withdrawal my payment ?
faq.answer: We have widget for deposit/withdrawal your payment. You can withdraw your payment to your bank account or any other cryptocurrency wallet. You can withdraw your payment anytime you want.
